attributes.action: Scrap the European Human Rights Act in this country
attributes.additional_details:
This is your human Rights act:- A Mugabe torturer is told that he cannot be deported back to Zimbabwe, as that would breach his human rights! A burglar from Nottingham has been freed from jail on appeal so he can care for his children; due to the Human Rights Act. Up to 1,200 paedophiles and rapists will be able to demand their names are removed from the Sex Offender Register every year due to the Human Rights act. Celeb’s hide their wrongdoing behind the Human Rights Act. Immigration Tribunal will not allow the deportation of Learco Chindamo, the Italianborn killer of London  headteacher Philip Lawrence, due to Human Rights act. Illegal immigrants including rapists and multiple offenders allowed to stay in the UK because of the Human Rights act.

 Invoke Article 58 of Protocol 11 - Denunciation and rid us of the human rights act. We have the right to pull out of this piece of European law if the liberal, politically correct will let us
